prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a sleek, humanoid form and can levitate effortlessly.
I want a Pokemon that uses its mind powers to control energy, with a bright yellow color scheme.
Generate a legendary psychic Pokemon with distinctive features like spoons and a wise expression.
Make a medium-sized, bipedal Pokemon with a focus on telepathy and aura reading abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, known for its intelligence and strategic combat skills.
Design an elegant, yellow Pokemon that can predict its opponent's moves in battle using psychic powers.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from Kadabra and has unique abilities tied to its psychic powers.
